name: whats-my-browser
label: WhatIsMyBrowser
description: WhatIsMyBrowser parses user agent strings and gives insight into known user agents. This Connector supports executing investigative action like parse user agent on the WhatIsMyBrowser.

fields.title: Server
fields.description: Server URL of the WhatIsMyBrowser server to which you will connect and perform the automated operations.
fields.name: server_url

fields.title: API Key
fields.description: API key that is configured for your account to access the WhatIsMyBrowser server.
fields.name: api_key

fields.title: Verify SSL
fields.name: verify_ssl
fields.tooltip: Specifies whether the SSL certificate for the server is to be verified or not. By default, this option is set as True.
fields.description: Specifies whether the SSL certificate for the server is to be verified or not. By default, this option is set as True.

operations.title: Parse User Agent
operations.description: Parse a user agent string to retrieve insight details from WhatIsMyBrowser server.

parameters.title: User Agent
parameters.description: Specify a user agent string to retrieve insight details from WhatIsMyBrowser server.
parameters.name: user_agent
